website_summaries.verdict: This simple 2-piece set is a great gift idea to treat yourself to.
pros: Simple set comes with decanter and 1 matching glass
Classic diamond design gives an elegant feel
The decanter is thick and has a solid weight to it
cons: Set must be hand washed, not dishwasher safe

customer_reviews.title: Stopper wobbles really bad.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful decanter but disappointed stopper wobbles so bad that I'm afraid of storing any good liquor in it of fear of not sealing. I expected more from this company. Shipped it back for a new one. Got it today. And wow it's the same way. Guess I'll keep it give it to someone for a Christmas present. I'll buy ravenscroft next time never had any problems with there product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great Decanter
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made, heavy/thick glass and great looking. HIGHLY Recommended along with additional matching Marquis Glasses. Did a lot of research and purchased from brick and mortar stores, but ended up returning all of the other to keep these.
customer_reviews.author: MP from NY

customer_reviews.title: This is only a 27 ounce decanter, not 30 oz as described
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice decanter and the glasses are great, however the decanter is quite small so I measured its volume very precisely and discovered it only hold 27 ounces. It is smaller than my other decanters and although it is a nice piece it appears diminutive next to the rest so is very disappointing. I specifically purchased it because it stated it was 30 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with the Marquis Vase as well as a Marquis decorative bowl. I have it all on my bar cart. Looks great. Most importantly with the Waterford name, no one has to know Marquis. It looks way more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: RobD

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than it looks like
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty / handsome. Bought for my son. He was very pleased. Good size, good quality. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cushman

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: Great authentic product. Way below retail cost with same quality. Great gift in Waterford box.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: NOT VINTAGE WATERFORD
customer_reviews.text: Got a decent deal and presented as a gift that was well received but noted that it did not seem to be “cut crystal” as older (made in Ireland?) Waterford is. Has a nice heft and looks nice but it lacks some of the vintage character that I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: E J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A happy decanter is a full decanter
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time looks like quality work and we used it for whiskey of course Irish whiskey
customer_reviews.author: russell k.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He really appreciated it's classy look.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Piper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a birthday gift and he loves it. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Absolute hunk of junk.
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to crystal. This is poured glass. The seams are evident on the decanter, the decorative depressions on the decanter and glass are not even close to being sharp or defined. Might as well go to Aldi's or Dollar Parlor.
customer_reviews.author: TK Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: Buyer's Remorse
customer_reviews.text: I have read quite a few articles about this item being of great quality. That depends on the eye of the beholder. I guess you get what you pay for. I was expecting it to shine in the light like some of the other crystal glassware I have. There are no extreme cuts and there are seam lines visible. I wish I didn't throw away the box... that's on me... now I am stuck with them. I guess they're good if you don't know what to look for. Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Classy!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is a big bourbon drinker and had been wanting a nice crystal set. Both of us were blown away at the quality, weight and look of them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Ok..... but
customer_reviews.text: Nice.... But not the quality of my other Waterford pieces. Not knocking this set at all. Just wasn’t for me. Returning
customer_reviews.author: MrRick60

customer_reviews.title: Molded. Not cut.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a few of these for comparison. Unfortunately I found this decanter and glasses to have a decidedly cheap feel. Molded. Not cut.
customer_reviews.author: IanJames

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Really nice glass, and beautifully cut. I feel like I'm on Madmen when pouring a drink.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. I purchased this item as a wedding gift for some friends. When an issue arose with my purchase (manufacturer defect) Best Crystal was quick to resolve it. Can't say enough good things about dealing with them! I appreciate all of their help.
customer_reviews.author: JBVB

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Dad for Scotch. He said he loved it, so I'm happy😁
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bridgette Wessels

customer_reviews.title: A bit more of a regular glass feel
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty set. I was expecting more from crystal. Lacking the brilliance. The seams are also evident. That takes away from the product. Looks and feels more like glass.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H.

customer_reviews.title: Received as wedding registry present
customer_reviews.text: Really nice! We put it on our counter filled with some basil hayden's on a silver tray. Looks great and goes nicely with the waterford glasses. May add the pitcher and high balls in the future. We like williams sonoma plastic whatever glasses for day to day use, but her grandparents get a kick out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

product_meta.title: Marquis by Waterford Markham 11 Ounce Double Old Fashioned Glasses Pair and Square Decanter Set, Unleaded Crystal
product_meta.description: Style Name:Decanter SetMarquis by Waterford combines versatility with value, using classic Waterford cuts to create crystal of astonishing clarity and substantial weight. The Markham Collection combines traditional-style cutting and quality with Marquis by Waterford Crystal value. Markham lends an air of sophistication to any event, with stemware featuring a classic cut pattern design and sculpted stems. A diamond-inspired pattern on the Markham drinkware collection from Marquis by Waterford adds stylish sophistication to every special occasion or cocktail hour.
feature_bullets: Perfect for Everyday Use and Entertaining
Weight and Stability of Waterford's Hand-Crafted, Fine Crystal
Presented in the Marquis Gift Box for Any Occasion
30 ounce Capacity Decanter 3.5 x 7" and 11 ounce Capacity Double Old Fashioned

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars87 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
